7557660180651.title: Women's Sugar 21" Cycling Crop Tights
7557660180651.description: The Sugar 21" Cycling Crop Tights blend the feel of your favorite leggings with cycle specific features for a familiar riding experience. Made from a buttery-soft fabric that moves with you, these tights sport a 21” cut that reaches most mid-calf. The high-rise waistband gently hugs the waist to create a flattering and smooth transition when paired with a casual top or jersey. Our single-density SELECT Levitate chamois offers a friction free interface between the saddle and your skin. Two side cargo pockets, cuffs trimmed with silicone printed grippers, and our signature BioViz® reflective elements make these tights ready and able, wherever the ride takes you.

7215284125867.title: Women's Prospect 2-in-1 Shorts with Liner
7215284125867.description: From the bike to the gym and back again, the Women’s Prospect Short is ready for all your active endeavors. This ultra-comfortable short is designed with motion in mind. The lightly-padded mesh liner provides additional pedaling comfort without getting in the way when you transition from the bike to other activities. You can even take out the chamois once you’ve arrived at your destination, if you’re so inclined. Plus, the liner has drop-in pockets to securely stash items when on the go. And just in case, the exterior features a durable water-repellent finish to shed road spray.

7215246114987.title: Men's Expedition PRO Bib Shorts
7215246114987.product_description:
Named to Gear Patrol's list of Best Cycling Bibs - Awarded "Best Blend of Comfort and Utility"

The Men's Expedition PRO Bib Shorts are the ultimate choice for the serious rider who demands the best in comfort and utility on long adventures. These bib shorts take your ride to new horizons with their luxurious Italian PRO Transfer fabric that masterfully balances compression and comfort. Engineered for rugged terrain, whether gravel or tarmac, the shorts are equipped with innovative triple-density PRO Levitate chamois that minimizes discomfort and abrasion while providing superior stretch for optimal body contouring. Practicality meets performance with low-profile cargo pockets on the thighs and additional storage at the rear, ensuring essentials are within easy reach. Enhanced with PI Dry® technology, the shorts repel water and tire spray, keeping you dry and focused. The drop-tail design allows for quick nature breaks, adding to the thoughtful details that make these bib shorts a premium choice for those who see no limits to where their bike can take them.
7215246114987.chamois_features: minimizes discomfort and abrasion, providing superior stretch for optimal body contouring
7215246114987.pockets: low-profile cargo pockets on the thighs, additional storage at the rear
7215246114987.benefits: comfort and utility, rugged terrain, optimal body contouring, easy access to essentials

6950799376555.description: This lightweight skirt features a snap-out cycling liner for versatility and comfort. It’s designed to hug the hips and stay in place rather than flap open on the bike. The waist is cut high in the back for coverage while we cut low across the stomach for comfort on the bike. It includes our comfortable and highly breathable Women’s SELECT Escape 1:1™ chamois.
